Split< T >A split corresponds to the bipartition of the leaf set induced by an internal edge
SplitPLess< T >Split pointer comparison
SplitTable< T >The split table can load all non-trivial splits of a tree and provide set-like operations with split tables of other trees in order to identify common splits
